channel.title: Chrismn.info
channel.description:
Chrismn.info
[b]What is it?[/b]
A website and forums about programming, tutorials, and more.
[b]Why should I join?[/b]
Go to the main site, look around, get ideas and suggestions, go to forums then post them. All tutorials posted will be added to the tutorials section unless you do not want them to be added. Soon we will add tons of tutorials so everyone can learn somthing new. There is also a pastebin for users to use.
[b]Is it approved?[/b] Yes, the unamed approved it.
[IMG]http://i18.tinypic.com/62z7zbm.jpg[/img]
If you wanna flame thats nice, you get the nice warning dot :)

item.title: Chrismn.info
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:4, topic:117431”]For your IRC page, you can simply do this:

irc://irc.deltaanime.net:6667/mopar

irc.deltaanime.net being the server
6667 being the port
mopar being the channel

To open their IRC client, connect to server on port then joins channel.[/quote]
Thanks Un-named currently don’t have a irc channel though. I guess ill make one a bit later

Read full topic

item.title: Chrismn.info
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

For your IRC page, you can simply do this:

irc://irc.deltaanime.net:6667/mopar

irc.deltaanime.net being the server
6667 being the port
mopar being the channel

To open their IRC client, connect to server on port then joins channel.

Read full topic
